dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 4464 IH: Common Sense Credit Union Capital Relief Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Posey introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To repeal the rule issued by the National Credit Union Administration titled Risk-Based Capital.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Common Sense Credit Union Capital Relief Act of 2017.

The rule issued by the National Credit Union Administration titled Risk-Based Capital (published at 80 Fed. Reg. 66626 (October 29, 2015)) shall have no force or effect, and any regulation revised by that rule shall be applied as if that rule had not been issued.
